name: 1Day一天
description:
If I could have you back again, for even just one more day, what would I do?

‘Hi, my name is Moonface, and Squareface was my best friend. We had squabbles and fights, yet we were still together.

But since he was gone, I realized that there must be other ways to solve the problems existed between us.

I found that losing the game is not that bad, if he was winning...

I wish that the balance of our friendship was always in balance...’


This is an independent artistic game, all the incomes will be used for the creation of my next work. Thx for your support.

The game included a variety of classic 2D playing technics，such as shooting, jumping, tank war, puzzle solving, etc. With delicate drawings, a reversal plot appears if the player full scored the beginning levels.

let's reminisce our childhood playmates, now.

Thank you for listening to my story.
